mapper.select:
select sum(i.investment)/100 investment, ip.name platformName from investment i, investment_platform ip where i.platform_id = ip.id
and now()> i.start_date and now() < i.end_date
and (now()< i.start_date or now() > i.end_date)
and i.investor_id = #{investorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
group by i.platform_id

select ROUND(sum((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)*datediff(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) profit , ip.name platformName from investment i, investment_platform ip where i.platform_id = ip.id
and (now()< i.start_date or now() > i.end_date)
and now()> i.start_date and now() < i.end_date
and i.investor_id = #{investorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
group by i.platform_id

select ROUND(sum(i.investment)/100, 2) investment , ip.name platformName, i.investor_id investorId from investment i, investment_platform ip where i.platform_id = ip.id
and (now()< i.start_date or now() > i.end_date)
and now()> i.start_date and now() < i.end_date
and i.investor_id = #{investorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
group by i.investor_id, i.platform_id

SELECT t1.investorId ,t1.platformName ,t1.investment ,t1.deducted ,t1.profit ,t1.principalAndInterest ,t1.investmentAmount ,t3.dailyProfit ,t2.totalInvestment ,t2.totalDeducted ,t2.totalPrincipalAndInterest ,t2.totalProfit ,t2.totalInvestmentAmount FROM ( SELECT ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) profit , ROUND(SUM(i.investment)/100, 2) investment , ROUND(SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) deducted , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000 + SUM(i.investment)/100 + SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) principalAndInterest , COUNT(i.id) investmentAmount , ip.name platformName , ip.id pid , i.investor_id investorId FROM investment i, investment_platform ip WHERE i.platform_id = ip.id
and now()> i.start_date and now() < i.end_date
GROUP BY i.investor_id, i.platform_id) t1 , ( SELECT ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) totalProfit , ROUND(SUM(i.investment)/100, 2) totalInvestment , ROUND(SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) totalDeducted , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000 + SUM(i.investment)/100 + SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) totalPrincipalAndInterest , COUNT(i.id) totalInvestmentAmount , ip.name platformName , ip.id pid , i.investor_id investorId FROM investment i, investment_platform ip WHERE i.platform_id = ip.id GROUP BY i.investor_id, i.platform_id) t2 , ( SELECT ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon))/365/10000, 2) dailyProfit , i.platform_id pid , i.investor_id investorId FROM investment i
WHERE now()> i.start_date and now() < i.end_date
GROUP BY i.investor_id, i.platform_id) t3 WHERE t1.investorId = t2.investorId AND t1.pid = t2.pid and t1.investorId = t3.investorId AND t1.pid = t3.pid

SELECT t1.investorId ,t1.investment ,t1.deducted ,t1.profit ,t1.principalAndInterest ,t1.investmentAmount ,t3.dailyProfit ,t2.totalInvestment ,t2.totalDeducted ,t2.totalPrincipalAndInterest ,t2.totalProfit ,t2.totalInvestmentAmount FROM ( SELECT ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) profit , ROUND(SUM(i.investment)/100, 2) investment , ROUND(SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) deducted , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000 + SUM(i.investment)/100 + SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) principalAndInterest , COUNT(i.id) investmentAmount , i.investor_id investorId FROM investment i
WHERE NOW()> i.start_date AND NOW() < i.end_date
GROUP BY i.investor_id) t1 , ( SELECT ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) totalProfit , ROUND(SUM(i.investment)/100, 2) totalInvestment , ROUND(SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) totalDeducted , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000 + SUM(i.investment)/100 + SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) totalPrincipalAndInterest , COUNT(i.id) totalInvestmentAmount , i.investor_id investorId FROM investment i GROUP BY i.investor_id) t2 , ( SELECT ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon))/365/10000, 2) dailyProfit , i.investor_id investorId FROM investment i
WHERE NOW()> i.start_date AND NOW() < i.end_date
GROUP BY i.investor_id) t3 WHERE t1.investorId = t2.investorId AND t1.investorId = t3.investorId
